name: Immortal Party
description:
Immortal Party is a  local party game from 2 to 4 players. Fight with your friends to be the last one standing in the arena.

Frenetic gameplay
2 to 4 players
run, sprint and push you opponents away
4 different characters with unique abilities more than 10 crazy arenas to play

The game takes place in a world where immortals have become bored, so they created a sport so dangerous that can only be played by them.

DEVELOPED BY:

MORE CROISSANTS (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 2, 2018/2019)
